mapper.insert: Insert into movie (movieVal, movieCd, movieNm, rank, openDt, audiAcc,salesAmt, insertDt) values (#{movieVal},#{movieCd},#{movieNm},#{rank},#{openDt},#{audiAcc},#{salesAmt},#{insertDt})
mapper.select: select movieCd, movieNm, rank, openDt, audiAcc, salesAmt from movie where movieVal = #{movieVal} and insertDt =#{insertDt}
